products.author: Ladybird
products.description: Yoto says: Join Otto, Cassandra and Missy on 5 audio adventures and discover the deep sea, amazing vehicles, outer space and more! Be transported with these fact-filled, award-winning stories - written especially for audio. This pack includes: The Animal Kingdom Amazing Vehicles Deep Sea Dive Outer Space Dinosaur Times
products.descriptionMarkdown:
_**Yoto says**: Join Otto, Cassandra and Missy on 5 audio adventures and discover the deep sea, amazing vehicles, outer space and more!_

Be transported with these fact-filled, award-winning stories - written especially for audio. This pack includes: 

*   [The Animal Kingdom](https://www.yotoplay.com/collections/library/products/animal-kingdom-ladybird-audio-adventures)  
    
*   [Amazing Vehicles](https://www.yotoplay.com/collections/library/products/amazing-vehicles-ladybird-audio-adventures)
*   [Deep Sea Dive](https://www.yotoplay.com/collections/library/products/deep-sea-dive-ladybird-audio-adventures) 
*   [Outer Space](https://www.yotoplay.com/collections/library/products/outer-space-ladybird-audio-adventures) 
*   [Dinosaur Times](https://www.yotoplay.com/collections/library/products/dinosaur-times-ladybird-audio-adventures)

yotoCreatorModalProps.bodyText:
### Who are Creators on Yoto?

Creators are independent audio makers bringing their original stories, games, songs and more to Yoto Cards. We hand-pick the best and freshest ideas — so every Creators Card meets the Yoto gold standard.

cardInfoBlockProps.title: Final call for Christmas gifts
cardInfoBlockProps.copy: Order by 5th Dec to get them on time!

yotoOriginalsUpsellTextBlockProps.bodyCopy: A digital version of this card is included in your Yoto Club subscription.
